code: const mongoose=require("mongoose");const app=require("./App");const PORT=process.env.PORT||5001;mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI,{useNewUrlParser:true,useUnifiedTopology:true}).then(()=>{console.log("Connected to MongoDB");app.listen(PORT,()=>console.log(`Server running on port ${PORT}`));}).catch(err=>{console.error("MongoDB connection error:",err);});
